newsitem.title: USA: Active Voice in voice processing pact.
newsitem.headline: Active Voice in voice processing pact.

text.p: Active Voice Corp said on Monday it made an agreement with Tadiran Telecommunications Ltd to integrate Tadiran's repartee voice processing system with Tadiran's coral telephone systems.

The deal also allows Tadiran to sell TeLANophy, Active Voice's computer telephony integration product, the company said. TeLANophy is the local area network, or LAN, integration package for the company's repartee systems.
No further details of the deal were disclosed.
Tadiran, based in Israel, focuses on digital public switching, access and transport systems, data communications, wireless access systems and business communication systems including wireless PBXs.
